data.title: Southwest Virginia Criminal Justice Training Academy – Modern Law Enforcement Training
data.text:
ALS Less Lethal Instructor Course

Instruction by: Paul Widener, ALS Certified Master Instructor This three-day certification course will prepare instructors to develop and implement departmental training programs in each of the topic areas, each of which is one day of instruction (Chemical, Impact, and NFDD). Departments desiring to become/remain certified in an individual discipline may register for [...]
